title: Bair's Chicken
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Be aware that this is a fried chicken restaurant. That said, it's reported to offer 2 vegan "chicken" dishes. The vegan "chicken" salad is made from chickpeas, celery, onion, relish, and veganaise. The vegan spicy "chicken" wrap is made of cornmeal breaded tofu fried in soy oil. Both items are served on a whole wheat wrap with lettuce and campari tomatoes plus your choice of either hot or Annie's Organic BBQ sauce. Separate prep utensils are used for vegan food. Call ahead to confirm before you go.
